Messages.Author: Edda Ostertag
Messages.Content: Looking forward to see you all on the 3rd of July! Group 1 BA - start 9:00 Group 2 MA -start 13:00 Greetings Edda

Messages.Author: Anna Neuhaus
Messages.Content: A small but very important remark from us to the upcoming session – especially for the masters. It is crucially important that to the next meeting you bring in pointed representations. In order to have enough time to elaborate those until hand-in of your thesis – it is very important that we can discuss your project based on visual representations that bring your narration to the point. they are the crucial moment in which your project becomes discussable – that is the only way we can give you truly helpful feedback. We are thus much looking forward to an inspiring session! All the best! Anna

Messages.Author: Alejandro Orduz Trujillo
Messages.Content: Dear all,  we hope that you are doing well!  We wanted to communicate the schedule for the coming meetings (5. June / 3. July  / 24. July), so that you can plan accordingly! The BA Klasse will take place from 9.30 to 11.30 and the MA Klasse from 12.30 to 15.30.  Each of you has a 30 min. presentation, plan therefore for 15 min. presentation and 15 min. feedback -of course in the case of 2 people projects (BA) you have more time!  We are very much looking forward to meet you next Wednesday in our chair!  Best,  Alejandro, Andreas, Anna & Edda.
